website_summaries.verdict: Powered by your own body weight and targets major muscle groups.
pros: A workout device designed to ease your way into a total body workout
Customers appreciate you can start slow and customize your workout
cons: Not advanced enough for those who workout on a regular basis

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 73 and have bought many pieces of exercise equipment and they all were given away. This machine is awesome. It is easy to do, doesn't take up much room and very sturdy. I haven't exercised in years, but I enjoy the workout on this. If you do it correctly you get a good ab and leg workout. It is fun to use. I've had this on my wish list for quite a while. When they dropped the price I couldn't resist. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen jankowski

customer_reviews.title: Raising the seat made it easier
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality for the price - sturdy and well-built. Easy to assemble with included wrench. Fun to use. It did remind me of my time cantering on a horse. I am 5'4" and set the seat to the medium height which worked fine. But when I set it to the highest height for my 6'2" husband, I found that it was easier for me to work. So if it feels a bit too hard to move at the seat height you have set, try setting the seat higher. I felt my deep stomach muscles had gotten a good workout after several 5 minute sessions. I am 63 and had no trouble working the mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: ... the trainer and finally reallized it wasn't doing mych good. When I started to use my body to ...
customer_reviews.text: The first couple weeks I was using my feet to propel the trainer and finally reallized it wasn't doing mych good. When I started to use my body to move the machine, I could really see the difference. I use the foot stand to "just" rest my feet now. It is great. I have also added some free weights to my workout to get some upper body.
customer_reviews.author: Pan

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help strengthen core muscles for better posture. Pretty easy to assemble and, once you get the hang of it, use. It is effective. But would definitely recommend going easy at first, every other day, with short sessions to let your body adapt. Also would recommend attaching a good bicycle seat pad because the existing seat is not well padded. I experienced some bruising of my tailbone because I tried to do too much too fast and was not using a seat pad.
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, but one will probably need to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but one will probably need to purchase a foam doughnut from a local pharmacy as the seat can become uncomfortable for people with minimal booty padding.
customer_reviews.author: BJM

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! You can definitely feel it working the core. I cAn only go 5 minutes right now but I'm going to work up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. It is a good work out. Took a few tries to isolate the muscles but once there it really squeezes the abs. I wish I could add some more tension to it though.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Rittenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Good product worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great to be able to keep an eye on tv with a product that works see results after 1st week 1st day you will feel it good investment as long as use it correctly light weight it’s easy to put away.
customer_reviews.author: william armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Little effort required for equestrians but happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because our barn is closed (COVID) and I was hoping to keep my riding muscles in shape. I did this for 10 minutes both ways and felt nothing (no resistance). I notice if I focus on sitting back and NOT using my legs but making my abs do the motion, it is a great workout. It’s pretty close to riding motion (except legs are out in front).
customer_reviews.author: Slund

customer_reviews.title: Rise and shine
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I brought it,at first I couldn’t get the hang of it until my brother got on it and I told him to go back and forth and he took off like crazy.and he enjoys himself.so I had to wait for my turn, so I got back on again,and still was doing wrong,but once I got into the motions of it,I went nuts and off to the sunset.i workout every day on it.and I also lost weight around my waist instantly for 10min.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON G.

customer_reviews.title: Works, BUT THE BODY IS CRACKED
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it there were a few places that were cracked. It works fine, BUT very upset that I paid $160 for this and it’s damaged! It also looks like someone tried to glue them together and then slapped a sticker on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber N. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dent in the purple plastic part. Don’t feel like sending it back and waiting for another one. Works as described. There is definitely a learning curve for the body movements. Also, it was easy to assemble. Parts were clearly labeled and the instructions were clear. Most of the small parts were just loose in the box. Would have been nice if they had come in a bag or something since I spent a few minutes looking for a pin that had lodged itself under one of the flaps of the cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun way to tone abs
customer_reviews.text: it will not give you a 6 pack but if you want to firm up your abs without sit ups, this is a fun way to do so. it was quick and easy to put together. the seat is adjustable. there is no tension setting on it. it is fairly quiet, it does make some noise but not loud. its like a soft hum. it does not take up a lot of room. easy to use. fun. i have noticed my abs feel firmer. oh, also it will work your legs as well. pushing foward on it works abs, pushing in reverse works legs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Albright

customer_reviews.title: Great workout, faulty mechanism.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great exercise machine. Once you know how to move it. You can feel your thigh muscles working and and eventually. You could handle the hard seat with the right movement. Great exercise, comfortably while you are seated. Except, after one week, horrible clanking noise that you can't fix externally because it comes from inside... So sad...
customer_reviews.author: wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. I got on this thing and felt the machine working my thighs and core right away. I can’t wait to see what multiple days of usage will look like.
customer_reviews.author: MC.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect of this little machine. I really like it. It’s fun and easy and since it’s human powered with no electrical cord, you can place it anywhere. I’m up to 15 minutes each direction. I haven’t noticed much of a “workout” but still use it pretty often. My husband says it hurts his back. I think you should be mindful of your posture to avoid strain on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Lynndee

customer_reviews.title: I love my rodeo rider core trainer
customer_reviews.text: I love my rodeo rider core trainer! The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is that the seat needs to have extra cushioning and be wider. Otherwise it is perfect!! A great core and lower body workout while watching your favorite tv show.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Flores

customer_reviews.title: Take your time cuz you get a backache.
customer_reviews.text: The rodeo core is okay.I kind of apply the exercise to the way I rode my horse has went nice and slow at first like a walk and then spent it up a little bit like a trot and then lope.can go fast like a gallop it's kind of fun but I find I have to hold onto the seat cuz I have a little balance issue so going fast really isn't good for me. You can adjust the tension to make it harder so you have to use your core in your legs and your butt more to make it move it's pretty cool I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin B.

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: i love it hate to exercise but this isn't a problem uses your own body weight which is the best. i got results quick. would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: judy clark

customer_reviews.title: Very fluid motion like swimming
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun way to exercise. It takes a little getting used to but in about a week it got easier. Feels like a swimming motion. Very fluid!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great but noisy.
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as it says I was also a big horseback rider back in the day and it does mimic the motion, but I am a little disappointed by the noise of the mechanism turning that sounds like a motorcycle revving...not loud enough to drown out the tv but I was under the impression this was a quiet machine.
customer_reviews.author: FantasyCreature

customer_reviews.title: Does not do a thing for you
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable! Doesn't work the muscles it says it works. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Jamie kite

customer_reviews.title: Bulls so skinny lol. Fun workout though.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this to work out on. So easy to assemble less the seat leveler not securing as tightly as hoped, due to hole alignment. once you get your "groove" easy to use. The Seat is UNCOMFORTABLE! house hold ranges from 50-250lbs and everyone's complaint is how uncomfortable the seat is. (use couch pillow if you have, there's no bull back that skinny lol) Sweat but no burn though. Hope Im using right. Going to up those ten min workouts to 20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Full Potential
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get a nice momentum going and absolutely allows full potential. I feel great after a ten minute ride. Best excercise machine ever. A softer padding on the saddle would cinch the length of use.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn (The Author)

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you want an easy and quick workout.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Enjoyable to ride. Can feel my core strength has increased since using it. It's just a little squeaky. 😏
customer_reviews.author: FriendOfAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: SO much FUN! Easy to assemble, small enough to fit in the corner of a room, and even five minutes is a good little workout. No plugs, simple design, easy to learn, smooth motion. Earned my five stars.
customer_reviews.author: JBM

customer_reviews.title: fun equipment
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this. It's well built and was easy to set up. It does take a few tries to get the rhythm going right but then it's fun and you can feel it working the muscles in your thighs and belly. The one thing I would recommend is that you wear padded bicycle pants when you use it. Because of the seat's construction, it chafes against your tailbone a bit if you lean back while riding.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. It was pretty easy to assemble. The seat is better than a standard bicycle seat so it didn’t hurt as much as some of the reviews led me to believe it would. It was so easy to use at first that I wondered if it would actually be effective. 2 minutes in I could definitely feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Boedecker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product when used the way it's intended. Easy to get on, Easy to use, Works the core just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: review sense

customer_reviews.title: May post a new review further down the line
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only had this machine for two days I'm hopeful it will show results. Only thing I noticed is for just the first ten min I started getting sore from the seat 😣 but I felt it working on my legs already.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie cox

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. When I use it I do feel a burn and feels like it's working. The part I dont like is the seat isnt very comfortable. It hurts a little when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron beck

customer_reviews.title: Great! Works well, but seat could be more comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it except the seat really hurts my booty. They need to put memory foam in the seat or something to make it more comfortable. It does work well!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Trust me.... golden ticket purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Favorite of all my machines. It's impossible for me to walk by my exercise room and not get on for a few minutes....throughout the day! Small bladder btw. Well worth the cost, and super fun to use. Blast some ACDC, and you're golden..
customer_reviews.author: C. Priestley

customer_reviews.title: Compact and great for legs
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a core machine but was often way too costly so was thrilled to have have found this! Simulates horseback riding, but I feel like I'm exercising my legs more so than my core, but I still love it!! I am also pleased with the size of the machine as it fits well in a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble only problem if the seat is very uncomfortable it's very hard I just got it in the mail today
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. The first one broke-left foot stirrup-broke off after 6 months. However, I enjoyed the light workout, while watching TV, for someone with knee problems that I purchased it again. This broke after, 2 months in the same place. The stirrup is soldered not bolted which does not hold up to the repeated up and down motion.
customer_reviews.author: JOAN W WOO

customer_reviews.title: Best workout and VERY comfy
customer_reviews.text: I grew up riding horses. This is the first machine I don’t dread. I hop on all the time. I’ve worked up to 25 minutes and already feel like I’m getting in shape again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So fat so good. Does do what it says only complaint is the seat, but thats expected .
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with all parts we are missing the back leg bar! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: stephanie B

customer_reviews.title: Fun effective exercise machine
customer_reviews.text: I love my rodeo core. It really works the mucles if you do it right and is also fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E.

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise apparatus especially for indoors.  It has a small footprint.  Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Use it at least 5 days a week. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: jimhammer1

customer_reviews.title: A great workout
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this machine, because it’s easy to move and it gives a smooth ride. I don’t have much cushion on my backside so I have to use a pillow when I ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Loved it

customer_reviews.title: This is easy, doesn't take up a lot of time or ...
customer_reviews.text: This is easy, doesn't take up a lot of time or space and produces results by using 10 minutes every other day!
customer_reviews.author: pat hagedorn

customer_reviews.title: Don't  like the noise
customer_reviews.text: I'm like the machine itself but it squeaks in a can't figure out why it's weekend. My friend has one but hers doesn't Squeak. The Seat is very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Bowden

customer_reviews.title: It is a good compact machine
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use. The one thing I wish it had was a tension knob so the workouts could increase in intensity.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Rodeo excercising
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I knew i would when i tried it at a korean japanese store
customer_reviews.author: Javier Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Fun exercise
customer_reviews.text: So easy doesn't feel like your exercising. However, don't overdo it. You will feel it if you do. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was amazingly fast. The machine is sturdy and quiet to operate. I have no problem watching TV while using it. They seat could be longer more padded. It is the best exerciser I've had so far that I can use while watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: corinne weis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to use & it works. Start slow & build your stamina. I am very pleased with my results.
customer_reviews.author: Musical Martini

customer_reviews.title: Hello correct posture.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a machine that addresses my stomach and back and it is low impact helping me establish a workout rhythm.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Custer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T Buy
customer_reviews.text: This Dumb thing reminds me back in the day riding the electric Bull. Pretty Stupid. There is nothing useful of this to help you tone. This thing is perverted
customer_reviews.author: cheryle a.pappalardo

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Not enough resistance or range of motion to do anything beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fine but noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Good machine, but it is a bit too noisy for watching tv while excercising. The manufacturer said it was normal.
customer_reviews.author: Gudrun S. Crittendon

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Fun way to exercise and easy to set up, once you study the illustration a while. The seat is a bit hard, but after a couple tries, you get the hang of where to sit comfortably. I could have written better instructions, but worth the effort to figure out. Great for sitting in front of your favorite TV program. You forget you're even on it in a couple minutes. Also, it makes my knee aches disappear and is already strengthening my legs after just a few workouts. I'm hoping that with enough use it will help keep my weight in check too. I'm a fairly fit 65 and like how it's actually fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Retagene Hanslik

customer_reviews.title: Need to wear biking shorts
customer_reviews.text: The seat is pretty hard, so I would recommend the padded biking shorts, which kind of goes against the "ten minute workout" theory. You WILL end up rubbing some sensitive areas very raw if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Newman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! Not hard to get a start on my workout with this:-)
customer_reviews.author: Charlene F. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can store it just about anywhere. Exercise and get the results I want with a small machine
customer_reviews.author: SumPease

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as scheduled, was easy to build, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Rush

customer_reviews.title: Good for those who want a REAL LIGHT workout
customer_reviews.text: Not a real good core trainer for someone trying to simulate vigorous exercise. This produced absolutely no aches the next day after using it for 30 minutes, which tells me it is doing little. However, I did have a slight sweat, which means it is burning calories. My estimate is maybe 200 calories an hour. I am 62 years old but swim 2 miles four times weekly for a total of 8 miles a week.
customer_reviews.author: Will B.

customer_reviews.title: I am 76 years old and so far I am very satisfied with this results
customer_reviews.text: Had to start slowly because of lower back issues. I am up to 3 days a week for 30 minutes each time. I feel my muscles tightening up and stronger in the back, legs and abbs my stamina is picking up. I am 76 years old and so far I am very satisfied with this results. I will be on 4 days next week and so on. So far I give the Rodeo Rider Core Trainer 5 Stars rating. My friends all want one.
customer_reviews.author: LMBASS

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise!
customer_reviews.text: This fitness trainer does exactly what it says it will do. I am on a weight loss plan and I see dramatic results using this trainer for exercise. My mid section is firmer and disappearing!
customer_reviews.author: Marmee

customer_reviews.title: before long you will be able to stay on as long as you like. It only took two weeks to see improvement
customer_reviews.text: This really works. Yes the seat is hard but, if you start out with just a few minutes each day, before long you will be able to stay on as long as you like. It only took two weeks to see improvement. Well made as well. Worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, very quiet. Doesn't take long to put it together Small enough to store it in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: pat stadler

customer_reviews.title: ... years I've had the recumbent exercycle and this is better!!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've had the recumbent exercycle and this is better!!! Amazingly only 10 minutes gives a great tightening effect. It's easy on the knees and back and best of all it actually targets the thighs starting from above the knees, the glutes and the abs. I'm extremely happy with it. It takes up very little space. To me the movement can be compared to an adult size rocking horse, or a cantering movement. Very gentle yet potent muscle usage.
customer_reviews.author: Debilyn

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble and use. Recently bought so can't speak yet to the results of using long enough to see results.
customer_reviews.author: MJWIL

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Easy to use while watching TV. This is a sturdy, heavy duty unit.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Orr

customer_reviews.title: Rodeo Rider Core Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I think it gives me a pretty good workout; however, it doesn't seem to be well-made. The knob keeps loosening, and then it starts to rattle. Sometimes I can't get it to tighten, but when I do get it fairly tight, it works loose again. If I try to turn it really tight, it slips back into loose mode. I Need to call the company and see if I just need a replacement knob or if there's something wrong with the part it screws into. If they are good about solving the problem, I'll revise this review. I definitely need to feel confident that it will give me good service for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for those like me who need to strengthen the core muscles. A quick exercise that can be done while watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Shelf Tamer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars! A great exercise machine!
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised. You can watch tv while using it. It is like riding a horse. It strengthens your back and core. It's easy to figure out. You can get your pulse rate way up there if you like (which I do). A great exercise machine! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: colleenesh

customer_reviews.title: Ride em cowboy!
customer_reviews.text: The directions were alittle confusing at first. After I played on it, I am now looking for my cowboy hat. My inner thighs are sore from just 10 min on it. It's easy, small enough to be placed anywhere ( which is one reason why I purchesed it). My last work out I really got the rhythm and started to feel it in my abds. YEEEEEE HAAAAAAAAA! I recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Genagon

customer_reviews.title: What I thought and more
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even seem like you're working out! So far so good
customer_reviews.author: CARAMELL

customer_reviews.title: It is easy and is a good warm up for the
customer_reviews.text: I am still using it. That is a feat in itself! It is easy and is a good warm up for the day
customer_reviews.author: D. Lantz

customer_reviews.title: ... having back problems and thought this would be a good little machine to improve the muscle tone
customer_reviews.text: I have been having back problems and thought this would be a good little machine to improve the muscle tone. It seemed to be working well. I recently had knee-replacement surgery, and am waiting for the muscles to be a little less tender, then I would strengthen them also using the Rodeo Core. It's kinda fun to just sit there and rock back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda M

customer_reviews.title: Almost pointless
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really give you any sort of workout at all. I used it for about an hour a day for a week before I lost interest completely.
customer_reviews.author: Noisyturtle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: VIVIAN CARR

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the bother, Find something else.
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't past the return date, I would. OK, i understand it is like riding a horse, but ever time I used it, I had issues within in hours. Saddle Sore. Good Idea, but just a poor execution of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lundahl

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.text: I assembled it with no other assistance other than the book of instructions, it does not have many parts. Being an avid horseback rider I really didn’t know what to expect. I got on and began to use this machine. It does mimic canter on horseback. I could really feel the burn in my thighs, lower back and stomach. I think it will be a great piece of workout equipment to build a stronger core, enhance my thigh endurance and strengthen my back. I also participate in half marathons and think will enhance my performance. Yes, the seat may bother some folks. I just used padded bicycle shorts. Worked great. I plan on using this when I watch. TV.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Fun and doesn't take up much space...
customer_reviews.text: It took me two or three days to get into a rhythm with this thing. I was wondering why it got so many good reviews, then it suddenly kicked in and started galloping along. Lots of fun and a good workout. It was a little hard to understand the assembly instructions and to put it together. Some of the holes didn't line up quite right or were not quite the right size. I needed a rubber mallet and a pair of pliers to complete assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love this machine. It takes some concentration and effort to get an ab workout, but I'm getting the hang of it. It's been a little under two weeks, and I'm already noticing an increase in core strength. My knees and quads are benefiting as well. Also, contrary to some previous reviews, I find the seat to be comfortable. I love the compact size too. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: skh

customer_reviews.title: Easy does it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to unpack, set up and use. It already has helped me strengthen my core and legs which improves balance. As I approach my 70's, this is important.
customer_reviews.author: Bethie

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Nov 2016. Not even one year old and we are giving it away it is so squeaky and the gears inside keep thumping. Horribly expensive purchase and a waste of money for $250.00!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lani01

customer_reviews.title: This is nice work out
customer_reviews.text: I have back problems and needed something to work out on that was low impact, THIS IS IT I have used it now for almost a year and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Cool little exerciser
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and easy to put together. Seems well made. Reasonably quiet. So far, so good- I'm having fun with this! It's very easy to use and doesn't make you winded. It's easy to just hop on and ride for a couple minutes when you get the chance. I have lower back problems and so far it hasn't triggered them at all. I'm hoping this will also help with circulation in my legs. I really like the machine and I'm glad I bought it :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you really want this. It cost $119 to ship it back. I am a horse rider and I found this a bit hard to work, That's my take. If you can try one before you order, I would. I think some people would like it. It has a rythum and get it going makes it easier and beter work out.
customer_reviews.author: mmh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to put together. Base unit assembled all you do is attach a few items. Just started using it. So far hard on my knees. I have weak knees, painful knees, this motion seems to tire them out very quickly. I can feel the legs, hopefully over time it will strengthen them. I’m going slow. Don’t feel any ab difference but maybe it needs time. Definitely wear shoes, seat is okay I have no problems there. It’s a solid piece of equipment, before it makes my list of necessary or unnecessary items, I need to give it a while.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia, AZ

customer_reviews.title: so fun to use that I now need a complete waredrobe ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than a kitchen chair, light enough to move around as needed, so fun to use that I now need a complete waredrobe overhaul because of constant use. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: JustBCause

customer_reviews.title: great ab workout
customer_reviews.text: This was for a co-worker that is getting back into bull riding & he absolutely loves it, great ab workout.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy workout
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how effective it is, but still giving it a try. Not as hard to use as I anticipated. Feels like a good, yet gentle workout. Trick is to use your body, not your legs to move the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my mother and she uses it all the time and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tessie Travels

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This exerciser was easy to set up and is easy to use. The seat is a little uncomfortable, especially if used more than ten minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh MAN this is fun!
customer_reviews.text: I just got thit today and could not get off of it. I am 31 and love this so much. I feel some fatigue but I have no way to know if this works yet, but i dont care if it doesn't. So much fun! Will update in a few weeks with efficacy feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Texanlife

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy, and productive.
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy and enjoyable way to work on your core and enjoy watching television
customer_reviews.author: Dooks

customer_reviews.title: For the cost, this is great - especially to use while watching TV
customer_reviews.text: It works, it's fun, I love it. Only complaint, it squeaks and rattles a bit. Will have to see if I can fix that on my own. I notice it whenever a hefty kid comes over and uses it, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Pippy Longstockings

customer_reviews.title: Yee-haw
customer_reviews.text: Fun to ride! It was a little tricky to assemble, but not too bad. Also, it took me a little while to figure out how to actually start the motion of this leg-power driven machine, but once I got it going it was really fun and easy. They say that 10 minutes is equivalent to 100 sit-ups; my first time on it I could only do 4 minutes (40 sit-ups). I wasn't sore the next day and I have multiple sclerosis and scoliosis.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A good machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a super exercise machine. I feel like it really works my legs and core. BUT, the seat is very uncomfortable for me. I have padded it with sheepskin.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: geddy up
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it is the action of riding a horse without having a horse/ feel it working all the muclres they say it workd/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my rider only got four stars as it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my rider only got four stars as it makes my bottom very sore from the hard seat
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to put together and have been using everyday
customer_reviews.text: it was easy to put together and have been using everyday. First was hard on my knees, but as I keep using it is easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! This machine is quiet and rhythmic
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! This machine is quiet and rhythmic. I can forget I'm even using it if I watch TV at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Reganvt

customer_reviews.title: Fun Workout
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble! Terrific compact workout machine! Makes working out fun!
customer_reviews.author: MFG

product_meta.title: Daiwa USJ-804 Rodeo Core Compact Core Trainer Ab Workout Equipment for Leg Thighs Buttocks Calves
feature_bullets: Rodeo Core abdominal exerciser uses a forward and backward motion to make any ab workout fun.
10 mins=100 Sit Ups! For a flat stomach, use each day in combination with a healthy diet.
Core trainer helps reshape back, waist, stomach, and thighs by engaging core and upper leg muscles.
Unlike other ab workout equipment, Rodeo Core is a compact machine that requires no electricity.
This ab core trainer uses the same muscles as horseback riding, like legs thighs buttocks calves. Great ab workout equipment
